abstract: Congressional Memo; Sen Bernie Sanders has returned to Senate and is urging his colleagues to take up policy fights in line with values he has espoused on campaign trail, in bid to expand coalition he built while competing for Democratic presidential nomination; Sanders has yet to withdraw from race.

headline.print_headline: Sanders Returns to Capitol, Campaign in Tow
headline.main: Bernie Sanders Returns to the Capitol, His Campaign in Tow

snippet: Sounding campaign themes and exploring the reaches of his newfound clout, the senator looked to turn an apparent defeat in the primaries into success in Congress.
lead_paragraph: Sounding campaign themes and exploring the reaches of his newfound clout, the senator looked to turn an apparent defeat in the primaries into success in Congress.
